General.Name: Eagle High Plantations Tbk
General.Description: PT Eagle High Plantations Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the oil palm industry in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates through two segments, Plantations and Manufacturing. The company offers palm products, including crude palm oil, palm kernel, and fresh fruit bunches. As of December 31, 2022, its total planted area was approximately 94,666 hectares in Kalimantan, Sumatera, Sulawesi, and Papua. The company also engages in the palm oil mill and bulking activities. PT Eagle High Plantations Tbk was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
